Reviews.Title: Check first regarding prior owners info downloaded into products
Reviews.Author: Buyer55
Reviews.Content: I love my phone but I did have some trouble at first.  The previous owner hadn't had all his info. cleared out and ready for mine.  I had to contact him a few times until I was able to load my info and use it.  I would recommend to other buyers of this type of product to communicate about the clearing of info prior to the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Iphone 5
Reviews.Author: Ajiane Lee
Reviews.Content: I've received my phone broken. Half the screen was cracked. I would not recommend this product. I did not order a broken phone!

Reviews.Title: Was still activated
Reviews.Author: Charlene Bendon
Reviews.Content: It had no sim. Had to go toApple store to get a new Sim card. Then went I went to Sprint to get it Activated I was told it was still activated to someone elses account. I could not use this phone at all

Reviews.Title: Will buy again if I need it
Reviews.Author: ramon
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery great product awesome price met all my expectations and will highly recommend to buy. Easy to activate as well

Reviews.Title: Iphone 5
Reviews.Author: Julian bermudez
Reviews.Content: Got the phone just in time for my bday lol phone came in excellent condition brand new . Giving it 4 stars just for the fact it didnt bring a sim card but other than that phone works great

Reviews.Title: No SIm Card!!!
Reviews.Author: JayzFlightpath
Reviews.Content: I figured it would come ready to activate but that would be a no! Had to buy a specific sprint sim card for 40 bucks.  Kinda disappointing.  Also was brand new no scratches.  It had tons of scratches and dents all over it.  Yikes! Not gonna spend
